title: javadoc for util.Constants.LINUX says "true iff running on Windows"
description: the javadoc associated with the util.Constants.LINUX constant says"true iff [sic] running on Windows"the "iff" error occurs in several places in this file.  The windowserror is pretty funny.

comments.content:
The "iff" means "if and only if", and the Windows lapsus calami has been fixed 
in the CVS repository.
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic

comments.content: Bug 7974 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
